data.title: 2008 BUY/SELL Discontinued Keller Chestnut Creek *Updated
data.meta_description:
ATTENTION ALL USERS! This posting is for Keller's CHESTNUT CREEK ONLY! Please use a different thread to post for other lines. Make sure you clearly state what you are seeking to buy or trying to sell. INCLUDE YOUR CONTACT INFORMATION within your post (email or telephone number.)     

Below is a list of items that Keller made in the Chestnut Creek line. This list is for information only and assist in describing the pieces you have or want.

I have an original brochure outlining what is available in Chestnut Creek and the dimensions. According to the brochure, the furniture is made of solid chestnut oak and white oak with a chestnut brown catalytic varnish. Below are some of the item numbers/names for the different KELLER CHESTNUT CREEK furniture pieces. Please feel free to supplement for everyone's benefit.
#2650 Bedside Chest (nightstand 24"W x 16"D x 29"H) with 4 drawers and a pull out shelf. Top drawer is felt-lined.
#2670/2675 Acorn Chest (larger with 10 drawers 46x23x48) and Entertainment deck (2 doors and TV shelf 49x24x40).
#2671 Wardrobe (2 top-to-bottom doors, clothes bar and smaller TV area 48x24x66.5) Note: Some people refer to this piece as an Armoire.
#2661 Five drawer chest (36x19x51) Some people refer to this piece as "The man's chest" or chest of drawers.
#____ Desk Chest (Flip up mirrored top with fold-down writing desk behind what looks like 2 smaller doors in middle of chest 36x19-32x56-74)
#____ Chesser (smaller dresser 52x18x44 with 2 small doors in the middle and 12 drawers) small "lady's dresser"
#2690 Dresser (larger dresser 64x19x39 with no doors and bigger drawers) large "lady's dresser" Note width & height difference.
#____ Vertical Mirror (Single mirror pane with metal scroll work at top 29x46.5)
#____ Triview Mirror (1 large mirror pane and 2 wing mirror panes with metal scroll work at top 54x46.5)
#2621 Wing Mirror (1 large mirror pane and 2 wing mirror panes with wood slats at top 54x40)
#2573 Country Cabinet (will hold the entertainment deck, has 2 doors and 2 drawers 49x23x48)
#2630 Sleigh bed (wide wood slats, no canopy) Queen size is #2630
#____ Metal Weave bed
#____ Panel Bed (solid wood panels with metal scroll work at top, matches wing/triview mirror, no canopy)
#____ Stick bed with canopy (Has metal scroll work at top that matches wing/tri-view mirror with a canopy)
#____ Bed Steps (2 steps, handle, 17x19x16)

There is also a whole dining room and living room collection but I don't have any item numbers for those pieces. I may be able to assist with some dimensions though.

Hope the information helps clarify info.

Again, be sure to include whatever contact info is appropriate in your posting.   Check back regularly for any information or items. You can also check the 2006 & 2007 posting/mailing list for relevent info.

Below is a list of items that Keller made in the Chestnut Creek line. This list is for information only and assist in describing the pieces you have or want.

I have an original brochure outlining what is available in Chestnut Creek and the dimensions. Posted By Sandra, 11/17/2008
